Class NodeRuntime

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.caoccao.javet.interop.V8Runtime
      • com.caoccao.javet.interop.NodeRuntime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IJavetClosable, IV8Convertible, IV8Creatable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class NodeRuntime
extends V8Runtime
    Node runtime is a thin wrapper over V8 runtime.

    0.8.0
